occupation: General Manager at Hastings Racecourse & Casino
headline: General Manager at Hastings Racecourse & Casino
summary: Creating a corporate culture that seeks to challenge the status quo through innovative employee relations.  Firm believer that the best employees are not found they are made.

experiences.title: Human Resources Manager
experiences.description: •	Develop and implement the Westin Grand Vancouver Human Resources Strategy•	Guide WGV on matters of Human Resources related policy and processes, including expert level knowledge of legal & legislative issues pertaining to employment•	Key member of the Leadership Team, sharing in the responsibility of the overall leadership of the business and the development of strategic priorities•	Develop and implement creative talent acquisition strategies while accurately determining organizational requirements through effective workforce planning•	Lead WGV in the consistent On-Boarding of new  leaders and employees•	Measure the outcomes of the HR programs through key metrics linking to ROI, adjusting and developing strategies where necessary•	Coach and guide leaders and associates in furthering employee engagement through engagement drivers that are linked to employee retention and business outcomes•	Assists Payroll with the administration of the Benefit program and manage the compensation program.•	Lead employee wellness program•	Facilitate Learning / Service Culture Training Courses for leaders and Westin associates

experiences.title: Volunteer
experiences.description: Respond to medical aid calls, motor vehicle incidents, and all fires from wild land to fully involved structure fires.  Provide community support through the Squamish Firefighter Association donating funds and time to local causes including hospice, the Woman's Shelter, the Terry Fox Run, Gun's and Hoses Charity Hockey Game, annual Easter Egg Hunt, and many other great causes.

experiences.title: Guest Services & HR Manager
experiences.description: Responsible for assisting with the oversight of all Guest Services, greeting and registering guests, providing outstanding guest service and settling guest accounts pre-checkout, making and modifying reservations, acting as hotel operator, and performing concierge duties, deliver outstanding customer service to guests of the hotel.  Other duties include loading and auditing room inventory, account reconciliation, posting daily and monthly sales and sourcing and obtaining quotes for hotel furnishings.

experiences.title: HR Specialist
experiences.description: Implement communication of employee programs through workshops, presentations and personal coaching. Provide consultation, guidance and support to HR stakeholders. Member of Health & Safety/Emergency Preparedness Management team. Analyzes and interpret specific articles in collective bargaining agreements and advise management in development, application, and interpretation. Manage all compensation, benefits, pension and reward programs. Monitor and analyze benefits usage data; recommend program changes and identify opportunities.

experiences.title: Human Resources Coordinator
experiences.description: Managed various benefit, pension and payroll accounts.  Coordinate leave of absence programs including disability, maternity and parental, self funded, and company approved.  Organized meetings, presentations, safety inspections,  and training programs.  High level database management, including updating, uploading and verifying data in code tables while analyzing, publishing and presenting reports to organization leaders and committees.  Provide feedback for conflict resolution, performance management, employee coaching and leadership assessment.

experiences.title: Benefits Coordinator
experiences.description: Managed disability laves, providing guidance to employees and senior leadership.  Assisted management with terminations benefit and severance calculations.  Designed new employee orientation package for Flex Benefits, established and facilitated all new employee benefit sessions

volunteer_work.title: Squamish Fire Rescue
volunteer_work.description: Respond to medical and fire calls providing community and district support.
